item.title: R Programming Superhero Cool Data Scientist/Engineer Design
item.description: A cool design for computer programmers, data scientists and software developers who write code in the R programming language. It shows the letter R on a yellow and red shield. Great for work, tech conferences and other data geek & nerd events.

item.title: Speed up your computer: pkill -9 java • Programmer Humor
item.description: If your computer has performance problems, make it faster by ending all Java processes with the command "pkill -9", which is shown in a black bold monospace font on this design.
